name: Brick Buster VR
description:
The classic video game touchstone re-imagined for VR.

If you enjoyed this adaptation, consider supporting me on Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/FearTent

This is currently a proof-of-concept that includes 10 levels.
Updates will include more:

  • Power-Ups
  • Special Bricks with Unique Properties
  • Sound Effects and Music
  • Enhanced Scoring Features
  • Menu Options
